original_body_lines: The statue of former Prime Minister the late D.S. Senanayake is garlanded on the occasion of his 112th birth anniversary in Colombo. The function to mark the birth anniversary was held today with the participation of Prime Minister Dinesh Gunawardane, UNP deputy leader Ruwan Wijewardene and former Minister Rukman Senanayake were also among the participants at the event. Pix by Nimalsiri Edirisinghe
